page.title: 11ON ROAD AND RAILS
page.content: A survey done by P1 and P2 on how we got to school the results were 2 children came on bikes,7 by bus,15 by car and 26 walk. P1 and 2 did another survey on how many vehicles go through Dairsie in one hour. Their results are below compared with a 1978 survey. {1978} Bicycles 8, Buses 10, Cars 164, Lorries 52, Motor bikes 50. {1985} Bicycles 1, Buses 10, Cars 436, Lorries 75, Motor bikes 10. On the A 91 there are three buses that pass or stop in Dairsie. The services are no.23 Glasgow/Stirling-St.Andrews, no.25 Dunfermline-St.Andrews and no.59 Edinburgh-St.Andrews. On the A 92 the services are no.41/46 Kircaldy-Dundee and no.53 Cupar-Dundee. The main Aberdeen to London line passes our area. Bryan Nicol Owain May Julie Nicol
